author: pvmulder
body:
Similar performance for legacy trackbased GhostTrack tagger (black) and candidatebased taggers on AOD (blue) and miniAOD (red)
![roc_gt_765](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5425769/15057422/02011d14-1317-11e6-91ed-93d94f872982.png)

Agreement between AOD and rerunning from miniAOD reasonable:
![gt](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5425769/15057421/0200fd52-1317-11e6-8c8c-8b60653feb30.png)
Differences to be further investigated.
title: First version of the candidatebased GhostTrack tagger
